HowCanHelp: ^How can my genius be of use?
^What do I need to do to get a key?
GetKey: ^To get my <color=#F8FF30>Key</color> you need to help me with one of my inventions.
^It’s just behind me, go over and press E to start.
WhatCity: ^You are in the lower sector of Hazy City, where I live with my inventions.
